post.author: Admin
post.title: Scrible on iOS
post.content:
Scrible has just been (re) published on Mobile !

You can find it here for iOS : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/scrible/id6453945582

(It is compatible with iPhone, iPad and Mac M1)

and here for Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.autremachine.scribla

 

It is a letters game where you have to find as many words as possible with the letters draw / the longest words possible, with a time limit.

Clock is ticking, every word found gives more time and more score.

How much time will you hold ?
